features: An ideal way to mount your Monitor or LCD panel TV to the wall,to use your space efficiently and watch your favorite TV shows comfortably!
Articulating TV Wall Mount (5329A) is designed to fit most 23''-42'' flat-panel plasma, LCD, and LED-backlit LCD TVs
With Strong Material: 1.8/2.0 mm cold-rolled steel, the Load Weight capacity up to 55 lbs, ensure secure support and long lasting durability
It supports VESA pattern up to 200 x 200 , it gives your home theater a clean look and ensures a perfect fit with your flat screen TV of choice
body.description: An ideal way to mount your Monitor or LCD panel TV to the wall,to use your space efficiently and watch your favorite TV shows comfortably! Articulating TV Wall Mount (5329A) is designed to fit most 23''-42'' flat-panel plasma, LCD, and LED-backlit LCD TVs. With Strong Material: 1.8/2.0 mm cold-rolled steel, the Load Weight capacity up to 55 lbs, ensure secure support and long lasting durability. It supports VESA pattern up to 200 x 200 , it gives your home theater a clean look and ensures a perfect fit with your flat screen TV of choice. Articulation controls allow for a 5 degree upward tilt, 15 degree downward tilt and 90 degree side-to-side swivel, adjusting for your perfect viewing angle. A Built-in bubble level is also included for easy calibrating to ensure this TV mount is perfectly installed. 100.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great value compared what you would pay at a big box store
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy, easy to install and works great at a very reasonable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this INLAND mount. I was looking for a full motion mount that was affordable and would support my 43-inch TV. This mount fit the bill perfectly.The mount is made of sturdy steel and can support a lot of weight. It has a wide range of motion, so I can easily adjust the TV to get the perfect viewing angle. I can also tilt the TV up or down to reduce glare.The mount was easy to install. The instructions were clear and concise, and all of the necessary hardware was included. I was able to get the mount installed in about 30 minutes.I've been using the mount for a few months now and I'm very happy with it. It's a great way to save space and get the most out of my TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very affordable, so far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Works perfect for my 11 year old as it's easy to maneuver and seems appropriately sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked perfectly, easy to install. Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High end feels sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: Used this for a little older model TV that is a little heavier. Still fits within the guidelines. Solid as a rock. All parts move and holding great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product at a Great Value.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tv mount. Works great. Sturdy. Low profile. Great value and great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Easy to mount but trying to get the TV to level up with the arm is not easy the arm will flex when twisting tv to rotate. Extending the arm will also make the TV not level. Would be nice to be able to adjust the arm base and make it easier to level up the TV rotation.Overall not bad easy to install but not easy to level.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heavy Duty TV Bracket
reviews.reviewText: The concept was exceptional, the directions great, finished product okay. Part of the bracket moved really loosely and my son still thinks it's broken. There were not enough screws for the bracket and holding up a 50-inch TV, and to me, that's a big job as I am the one who will have to pay for a new one. Also, due to the construction of our home, it could not be put up the way the bracket was made so it is being held by 3 screws mainly as there was only one side that lined up with a stud. The other three were put up with mollies and I don't know how sturdy those are. Thank goodness the TV isn't really heavy.
Son de construcción muy solida y pesados, aun no les damos uso pero quedé a gusto con la compra.
Es resistente y trae todo lo necesario para colocarse. Me fue muy util para una pantalla de 32”
Resistente y buena calidad para pantallas pequeñas y medianas.

Es un muy buen soporte y práctico por su diseño de brazo lo cual permite colocar el televisor en un lado u otro. Viene con todos los accesorios necesarios para montarlo, trae taquetes, tornillos, rondanas y una llave y su manual de instalación. Requiere broca de 3/8'' para montarlo.
